parameters.name: user_ids
parameters.description: User IDs or screen names ('screen_name'). By default, current user ID.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Profile fields to return. Sample values: 'nickname', 'screen_name', 'sex', 'bdate' (birthdate), 'city', 'country', 'timezone', 'photo', 'photo_medium', 'photo_big', 'has_mobile', 'contacts', 'education', 'online', 'counters', 'relation', 'last_seen', 'activity', 'can_write_private_message', 'can_see_all_posts', 'can_post', 'universities',

parameters.name: name_case
parameters.description: Case for declension of user name and surname: 'nom' — nominative (default), 'gen' — genitive , 'dat' — dative, 'acc' — accusative , 'ins' — instrumental , 'abl' — prepositional
